extension.summary: Launch different actions when XBMC/Kodi isn't busy
extension.description: Service to launch different actions when XBMC/Kodi goes to idle-state or wakes up.[CR]You can define different actions for the on-idle and after-idle event.[CR][CR]Available actions:[CR]-Minimize[CR]-Quit[CR]-Powerdown[CR]-Hibernate[CR]-Suspend[CR]-RunScript[CR]-RunAppleScript[CR]-PlayMedia[CR]-SlideShow[CR]-RecursiveSlideShow[CR]-PlayDVD[CR]-System.Exec[CR]-System.ExecWait[CR]-UpdateLibrary[CR]-CleanLibrary[CR]-ActivateScreensaver
